description: Welcome to the complete HD guide to Disneyland California! Our digital insider's guide is your one-stop resource for the entire Anaheim resort — including all three park hotels, the Downtown Disney district, and both Disneyland and California Adventure theme parks. What's included? Just check this out! • Interactive commentary! Provide your own reviews for restaurants, attractions and hotels, and get expert real-time advice from the author • YouTube video ride-throughs (most HD) of every attraction and show • Seven custom itineraries — from toddler-friendly attractions to foodie tours and Disneyland pub crawls • Menus and photos for every resort restaurant • Maps for both parks and Downtown Disney • Coverage of the entire resort, including Disneyland, California Adventure, Downtown Disney and the three resort hotels • Complete shopping guide for both parks, Downtown Disney and the three hotels • Hidden secrets • Hidden Mickeys • Tips for making the most of your visit • Special events • Photos of exclusive parties — including the 50th anniversary celebration and other celebrity events • Inside peeks of every luxury suite in the Disneyland Hotel • Author-created video tours of Disneyland and California Adventure PROBLEMS? QUESTIONS? Let us know in the comments section. We'll get back to you quick as a snap! ★ About the Author ★ Award-winning journalist Veronica Hill, who also penned the California Essential Guide, grew up in Orange County — just 15 minutes from Disneyland. She has been an annual pass holder since the early 1980s, and now shares the fun with her husband, Jason, and two children. Veronica's list of credentials include assignment editor at US Weekly; writer for Rolling Stone, Food & Wine and Seventeen magazines; author of three Fodor's California guidebooks, and a 15-year travel editor for the Daily Press and Freedom News Service. Veronica continues to cover the Disneyland beat for her website and YouTube channel — attending many of the park's exclusive events, ride openings and VIP parties. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com
release_text: • Dozens of new ride-through videos from Cars Land, Buena Vista Street and Mad T Party • Updated menus • Updated entries • New videos of Cars Land and Buena Vista Street Is there a feature you would like added to our app? Just drop us a line at disneylandinsider@gmail.com or follow us on Twitter @Disneylandapp

description: ★ Get the family outdoors to enjoy natural Florida ★ Stunning white-sand beaches, tropical palms, crystal-clear springs, and tours of mansions and fortresses await on your exploration of one of the United States' top state park systems, Florida State Parks. Written by Sandra Friend, author of 14 guides to hiking and travel showcasing natural Florida, this comprehensive app provides you compelling reasons to visit Florida's more than 160 state parks, including lush photographic tours of each destination. Within this guide, you'll be able to find parks within proximity to you as well as by specific city, cost, and by categories such as guided tours, historic sites, urban wildernesses, cabin rentals, and child-friendly parks. Call outfitters directly from the app, and review park maps, background details, and trail information via links to the web. Whether you enjoy camping, scuba diving, backpacking, mountain biking, a guided paddling trip, a tour of an antebellum home, or just a quiet walk on the beach at sunset, Florida State Parks offer an inexpensive and more authentic alternative to Florida's more well-known attractions. Use this app as your guide to make the most of your next Florida vacation - or your next weekend. ★ About the Author ★ Walking the gardens and pathways during her first Florida State Park (Washington Oaks) visit at the age of six, award-winning outdoor and travel writer Sandra Friend is a Floridian with a deep knowledge of the Florida State Parks system. Since 2001, she's written more than a dozen guidebooks to Florida, including titles in the "50 Hikes," "Explorer's Guide," and "5 Star Trails" series. During research for these and other Florida books, plus just the joy of exploring her home state, she has personally visited all but 5 of the parks presented in this guide - and those are on her to-do list. Sandra is a member of the Friends of Florida State Parks, the Florida Trail Association, the Florida Outdoor Writers Association, and the Society of American Travel Writers. She lives in Central Florida. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com
release_text: Lots of new content and software improvements!

description: Have you ever been bowled over by a stunning shrub or breath-taking perennial, only to discover that it doesn’t work in your climate zone or is too big for the intended space? For a gardener, this is the most painful sort of unrequited love. Whether your garden is small, large or exists only in your imagination, this app highlights some of the best options for plants that stay a manageable size. *Who This App is For* Beginning gardeners with small yards, balconies or courtyards. Experienced gardeners who have downsized to a smaller home. Large-space gardeners in search of inspiration for their smaller garden beds. Anyone who appreciates an easy-to-navigate plant resource guide with detailed information on a range of high-performing plants. *How This App Can Help You* Most nurseries and catalogs sort plants by sun vs. shade or plant type. Why slog through aisles of plants searching for ones small enough to fit your garden, when it's been narrowed down for you right here? Landscape designers and horticulturists from across the country have helped author Susan Morrison select nearly 100 of the best small-size ornamental plants, from trees that grow less than 25’ to shrubs smaller than 5’—not to mention well-behaved vines that won’t eat your house. Use this app to shop online, create a garden wish list, or take it along on your next nursery visit to instantly scout out the best plants for your garden. *What This App Offers* 90+ plants in seven categories: trees, shrubs, perennials, vines, groundcovers and ornamental grasses plus a special bonus category. Plant descriptions that include cultural requirements, maintenance tips, when to “proceed with caution” and alternate varieties. Tags that let you narrow down your selection by USDA climate zone, flower color, drought tolerance and more. Links to online nurseries and how-to videos. Pronunciation guide for botanical names that is both written and recorded. Step-by-step guidelines on sustainable planting practices, including sheet mulching and understanding soil composition. Garden glossary. Sunset zones included for Western gardeners. For much less than the cost of replacing just one unhappy plant that expires at the first sign of neglect, seriously, how can you go wrong? ★ About the Author ★ Susan Morrison is a landscape designer, master gardener, and the co-author of Garden Up! Smart Vertical Gardening for Small and Large Spaces, an Amazon “Best Books of 2011” selection. Her designs have been featured in various publications, including the San Francisco Chronicle,Small Space Container Gardens and Fine Gardening, where she also contributes articles on design and plant selection. Susan knows first-hand the challenges and rewards of gardening in a small space. Her own 18 by 50 foot back yard is a laboratory for fresh design ideas, a test garden for new plants and more importantly, the most popular “room” in her home on a summer evening. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

description: They say "every Texan has two homes, his own and San Antonio.” San Antonio is the most visited city in Texas, so welcome to the crowd! Each year, millions of tourists a year pour into the city to explore the Riverwalk, see the Alamo, and have some fun at the festivals. This app will help you navigate the Riverwalk with ease – finding restaurants locals love and discovering the city’s historic charms and giving you all the essential details you’ll need to prioritize the offerings. No need to settle for a mediocre meal or drink when a great one is right around the bend! A wide selection means there’s plenty to choose from – both tried-and-true standbys and pleasant surprises. Order a prickly pear margarita and fresh guacamole made tableside at Boudro’s or a bowl of German split pea soup at Schilo’s. Listen to live jazz at The Landing or enjoy the belly dancing at Dolores Del Rio. Go big with an upscale evening at Biga on the Banks or indulge in a Mexican pastry at Mi Tierra Café for less than a couple of bucks. In any and all cases, let the Texans show ya some hospitality! ★ About the Author ★ Amy K. Brown is a writer, photographer, and graphic designer who loves living in Texas. She is the author of Austin, San Antonio & and Hill Country and Backroads & Byways of Texas. www.amykbrown.com ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

Planning a Scotland trip? You've come to the right place.... This fiercely independent little country on Europe's fringes is so packed with history and charm that exploring it is well worth a few weeks of anyone's time. Many visitors will already be familiar with many of the classic Scottish set pieces before they arrive: tranquil lochs, heathery glens, hilltop castles and brooding mountains, idyllic beaches, pretty villages and homey pubs with good local whiskies are all fairly easy to find. But of course there's far more besides, particularly in Scotland's two great and very happening cities: Edinburgh and Glasgow. By using 1184 photos and 24,000 words in 155 entries SCOTLAND'S BEST will help you zero in on the sorts of things you will enjoy most on your trip to Scotland. It does this by listing all the key attractions in several NICHE CATEGORIES and by weaving many of these together into a few ITINERARIES for those simply wanting bit of everything. The itineraries also include suggestions of where you might get a good bite to eat along the way. NICHE CATEGORIES: ★ Castles ★ Fine Dining ★ Golf (WITH extensive background info) ★ Hiking ★ Historical Sights (WITH extensive background info) ★ Kids ★ Luxury Accommodation ★ Star Attractions ★ Sports & Activities (including skiing & mountain biking) ★ Whisky (WITH extensive background info) ITINERARIES: ★ Scotland in a week (6/7 days) ★ Classic Highland Tour (3/4 days) ★ Skye (3 days) ★ Edinburgh (1 day) ★ Glasgow (1 day) ★ Cairngorms & Moray (1 day) ★ Glencoe & Argyll (1 day) ★ Moray & The Great Glen (1 day) ★ Perthshire & Cairngorms (1 day) ★ Trossachs & Stirling (1 day) FEATURES: ✔ Easily SORT entries – by category, name, price, distance (using your device's inbuilt GPS) or region. ✔ Submit COMMENTS easily: give the author a piece of your mind for free! ✔ One-click website LINKS (including Twitter, Facebook & YouTube). ✔ One-click PHONE CALLS (on phones) ✔ Biannual UPDATES ✔ Detailed MAPS ✔ NAVIGATE quickly using the app's global search and hyperlinks between entries. ★ About the Author ★ Christian Williams has been a freelance travel writer since moving into his Edinburgh flat in 1998. He's covered destinations all over the world, but mostly specializes on Germany and Canada. He's lived in Scotland for 15 years and is pleased to finally be writing about somewhere on his doorstep. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

description: They don't call them the GREAT Smoky Mountains for nothing! Indeed, the Smokies is the most visited national park in the country--and this guide will show you why. It covers the best things to do in the national park as well as attractions, restaurants, accommodations, and shopping opportunities in the surrounding gateway communities of Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Sevierville, Townsend, and Cherokee. (The most popular locations are covered in the greatest depth.) Whatever your bliss--going miniature golfing amidst dinosaurs, hiking to waterfalls you can walk behind, floating in mid-air at a skydiving simulator, discovering chic sandwich shops and gourmet hotspots, soaking in a private hot tub with amazing mountain views, or shopping for outlet bargains and local crafts--this essential guide's got you covered. With this app you can: * get the real insider's scoop on what to see and do in the Smokies * sort entries you want to read by geographic area, by price, or by category * view more than 2,400 gorgeous images * get prices, rates, and hours * link directly to an entry's webpage and/or call its phone number * get turn-by-turn directions and see it on a map ★ About the Author ★ Travel writer and Knoxville resident Katy Koontz has been hooked on the Smokies for more than two decades. She's shrieked in their haunted houses, snapped up their Appalachian crafts, hit holes-in-one on their miniature golf courses (that's putt putt to you fellow locals), hiked their peaks, biked their valleys, gone tubing down their cold mountain rivers, whizzed through their treetops on ziplines, rode horseback through their woods, and rolled down their slopes inside a giant Zorb sphere. (She's even snorkeled the Smokies!) Her research has taken her to every corner of the gateway towns of Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Sevierville, Townsend, and Cherokee to regularly report on the newest and craziest attractions, the best places to stay (for romantic getaways as well as family vacations), and the greatest grub the region has to dish out. She also taps into the national park's natural nirvana on a regular basis. Katy is also the author of Family Fun in the Smokies: A Family-Friendly Guide to the Great Smoky Mountains (published by the Great Smoky Mountains Association, 2012) ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

description: ★ Your guide to traveling Virginia wine country ★ Virginia Wine in My Pocket is a website and companion app designed to guide travelers through Virginia's booming wine country. Whether you’re looking for a day-trip with friends, a romantic weekend, a week-long wine adventure, or a quick stop as you’re passing through, we’ll help you find your way. The new Virginia Wine In My Pocket website (www.VaWineInMyPocket.com) lets you track your winery visits and "favorites", keep private tasting notes, and review/comment on wines and wineries. The companion app provides crosswalk links at the bottom of each winery entry that let you seamlessly toggle between the app and site. If you love visiting Virginia wineries, you'll love Virginia Wine in My Pocket! According to the Travel Channel, "Virginia is carving its own niche in the little black books of savvy wine lovers searching for the next big thing." We are Virginia travel writers Rick Collier and Nancy Bauer, and we’ve spent a decade following the growth of Virginia's wine country, from a 65-winery footnote to a global rising star with 200+ wineries, international acclaim, and a multi-million dollar travel industry. We’ve personally visited more than 170 wineries in Virginia, and we’ll share our favorites. We also include our “Best of” recommendations, including Best for Group Outings, Best for Romance, and Best Views. What else will you find in the guide? • Wineries with on-site dining and lodging • Wineries open every day (even in winter!), and open late on weekends • Venues for your wedding or special event, or just a little picnic ẚ deux • Who puts out the welcome mat for kids and pets • Wineries with RV/bus parking (many don’t accept them!) • Where to find hard cider, mead, and fruit wines • Wineries offering free tastings (they're dwindling, but a few remain!) • Quick lists of wineries that are close to D.C./Northern Virginia, Richmond, and Charlottesville, plus wineries just off I-95 or I-81 Engaging, easy-to-navigate features include: • Photo slideshows for each entry • Google maps and driving directions • Tasting fees and operating hours • Direct links to the winery’s websites Join the Virginia Wine in My Pocket community! ★ About the Author ★ Photographer Rick Collier and travel writer Nancy Bauer kicked off their research for the Virginia Wine in My Pocket website and app in 2010, visiting 150 Virginia Wineries in 150 Days! From Hiddencoft Vineyards at the northern tip of the state, to Rosemont Winery at the North Carolina border, and over to MountainRose Vineyard in coal country, just a few miles from Kentucky, Rick took more than 10,000 photos, Nancy interviewed hundreds of owners, winemakers, and tasting room staff, and together they sampled more than 2,000 Virginia wines. Since the "150 Wineries" tour, the authors have continued to visit new wineries, and revisit old friends. They expect to hit the magical "200" number in 2013! They live in Northern Virginia, and they can’t wait to get on the road again. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

description: Fast Dash for iRacing is a FREE dashboard application for use with iRacing. It enables your phone or tablet to display Speed, Gear, RPM, Position, Lap, Fuel, Fuel Laps Remaining, Fuel Last Lap, Water Temp, Oil Temp, Oil Pressure, Current Lap Time, Last Lap Time, Best Lap Time and Track Position. The application also features a Shift Light. Users can set the shift light colour and enter a shift light offset value if required. The RPM meter LEDs can be set to round or square, and the animation mode to Left to right or Side to centre. Fast Dash for iRacing supports lots of colour options allowing you to customise the look and style of the dashboard. To get the iRacing telemetry data from your pc to your phone or tablet requires the use of the Fast Dash iRacing Server application. This is a Windows application and can be downloaded from www.swatterco.com. Fast Dash for iRacing supports UDP, TCP and USB connections. When connecting using UDP there is nothing to setup, just start Fast Dash iRacing Server, iRacing and your phone or tablet will automatically connect. For more information visit www.swatterco.com.
release_text: Version 1.5 Added LCD and LED fonts Setting for simple mode displaying just speed and gear Setting to hide borders Setting to hide water and oil panel Added ability to reduce screen display area on devices with large screens using pinch zoom or volume button Modifications to dash display to enable larger fonts in lap time panels You will need to download the latest version of Fast Dash for iRacing Server v1.5 from www.swatterco.com

Goob Alarm Clock (Get Out Of Bed Alarm Clock) Free Alarm clock that can only be switched off when you are really out of bed! The alarm clock uses the Wifi signal strength to determine your position. You will only be able to switch off your alarm when you are close enough to your WiFi router. NEW: Android wear watch faces NEW: Support for Pebble smartwatch Setup video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aE7dH1nlQm0 Like us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/goobalarmclock Setup (Get Out Of Bed ) Goob Alarm 1) If you are connected to a Wifi router you will see the current wifi level in the list of your alarms. The range is 0-100 with 100 max strength. 2) Go as close as possible to your wifi router and note the wifi level 3) Setup your alarm by selecting the alarm (short tap on the time) or create a new one by selecting menu - add alarm. 4) Set Dismiss type to 'Run to Wifi' and also select Dismiss Test button. The Dismiss Test button allows you to dismiss at all times ***use dismiss button only to test your setup***. 5) Set the Wifi Strength to the level you were getting close to your wifi router. 6) Set the time + 3 minutes, so you can test and press Done. Enable the alarm by pressing the square next to the wifi level. Press back or home key. Go to your bedroom and wait until the alarm sounds. 7)Unlock your phone and go towards your wifi router, you will see the wifi level changing in the dialog box. When you are close enough you can dismiss the alarm. (In test mode you can dismiss even when the level is not reached) 8)If all works well, deselect 'Dismiss Test button' in the dismiss type settings menu so you can only dismiss the alarm when you are out of bed! Troubleshooting - Advanced setup – Permissions explained 1) My Wifi router is in my bedroom (or close to it) so my Wifi strength is very high in my bed. Select 'Run from wifi' in Dismiss type and set the 'Wifi weakness' to a lower level than what you get in your bedroom. When the alarm goes off you have to move away from your Wifi router in order to be able to dismiss the alarm. Combining 'Run to Wifi' and 'Run from wifi' is also possible. 2) When you are tempted to force close the app or switch the phone off while the alarm sounds, you may try the advanced settings to block this (press menu when you see the alarm list). 3) Not connected to a Wifi router. If you have Wifi networks but are not connected to them you can enter the Wifi SSID and use the signal strength from that network. You do not need to logon to that network, only the signal strength is used! 4) Wifi will be turned on just before the alarm sounds (if it was switched off). This is why the app needs the “CHANGE WI-FI STATE” permission. 5) The app will add an Alarm icon to the home screen if the alarm is set. This is why the app needs the “MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS” 6) When a call comes in while the alarm sounds the alarm volume will go down. This is why the app needs the “READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY” permission. 7) “FULL INTERNET ACCESS” is needed for the banners (commercials). You can also wake up with music, using the music alarm feature by selecting a music song. With Goob Alarm you can select a free digital LCD alarm clock or analog glow in the dark alarm clock. Goob Alarm is smart, you have to get out of bed to turn off the alarm. Now with pink and green LCD Android wear watch faces If you would like to help translate the app in your language please visit: http://ackuna.com/translate-/goob-alarm-clock-free/ Full license: http://www.sygel.com/sygelsite/echip/license.html

SM Recorder is a simple recorder with a quite nice design. - there are no recording limits - you can manage your existing records inside the app by built-in file manager - you can play your records by built-in media player - you can share your records - you can set auto or manual recording for your phone calls - you can select a directory for your records - wav or mp4 file format - you can set sampling rate and bitrate If you really liked my work and you don't like in-app ads, consider buying paid version (it will keep me in business). The difference beetween free and paid is that, paid version doesn't contain ads. If you liked this recorder and there are things you wish him to have, just tell me and I will consider implementing them. Fell free to contact me by email. NOTICE! Permission for "REDIRECTING CALLS" is necesary to listen when you are making an outgoing call and record it. It is also the only way to receive a phone number and put it as a file name. If there would be some "bad code" in my app, Google would already shut down this recorder.

TABcab is the Mumbai's No.1, most preferred Radio Taxi service provider. With 2800 world class luxurious cabs, TABcab brings its native application on the Android platform, which makes cab booking simpler and quicker, for its esteemed passengers on the fly. The key features include: 1. Wallet Payment • Customers booking from the TABcab app will be able to pay from their Citrus wallet • Customers can also pay directly to Saathi (chauffeur) via Manual Payment option • Customers can see Wallet Transactions in his/her App. • Customers registered with Citrus can login with their existing credentials or can register and try using TABcab Wallet Feature. 2. Customer Satisfaction Survey: Now customers can provide real-time feedback on every completed trip. 3. Once the cab is assigned, customers can now track the cab real-time on the map with estimated distance and time of arrival 4. Customers can now call the Saathi (chauffeur) directly from the App 5. Ability to check details of previous bookings, fare details and provide valuable feedback about our services 6. Push notifications for various alerts like booking confirmation, cab & Sathi (chauffeur) details 7. Emergency Alert: A very useful feature in the app is “Safe Assure”, which can be used even when you have not booked a TABcab or even if you are not travelling in one. Once you select the number of a Guardian (i.e. a family member, friend, colleague or relative), TABcab’s Safe Assure can be used to trigger emergency alerts (thru SMS) to 5 guardians at one go in case of need. The SMS also contains your location details and see the location of user on the map (GPS connectivity required) 8. Convenient selection of pickup and drop location using various methods; • 1a) By tapping on MAP • 1b) By typing you current location • 1c) By Clicking on your current location using GPRS/GPS • 1d) By using your favourite location tagged by you • 1e) By clicking on your past travel locations • 1f) By clicking on the Airport icon 9. Once the cab is assigned, you can track the cab in real-time on the map with estimated distance and time of arrival 10. Call the Sathi (chauffeur) directly from the App 11. Ability to check details of previous bookings, fare details and provide valuable feedback about our services 12. Push notifications for various alerts like booking confirmation, cab & Sathi (chauffeur) details 13. Emergency Alert: A very useful feature in the app is “Safe Assured”, which can be used even when you have not booked a TABcab cab or travelling in one. Once you select the number of a family member or a friend, this feature can be used to trigger an emergency buzzer on family member’s (friends) phones in case of need. They will also receive an SMS with your location details and see the location of user on the map TABCab Your Peace CAB www.Tabcab.in
release_text: Bug fixes and Enhancements Map Improvements

description: Design Your Own Cool Car and Get Ready to Drive on Obstacle Courses! Go Luxury or Sporty - Awesome Design Features Makes this Amazing Car Game Rock! Dress up Stylish, Souped-Up Cars with Fenders, Snazzy Doors, Sporty Tires & More! Dress up some cool cars and get ready to race! This vehicle dress up game will get kids designing their own stylish, luxury or sports car. Start with 30 different models and kids can create dozens of different cars and vehicles to drive. Kids can choose snazzy and colorful doors, windows, fenders, sporty tires and more to dressup their vehicles. Pick your favorite race car number for the side door and rev up your engine! Choose your course and take your vehicle for a drive in the desert, alongside the beach, in the city, and pretend you are racing on a racetrack. But watch out kids - there are obstacles in this game that you must avoid! Watch out for the beach ball and tumbleweeds as you drive from the beach to the desert. Children love vehicles to drive and race and a great dress up game - this app combines both. Kids, hang onto your seats, this awesome dress up car game is just getting started! The game will take you to the racetrack and a beach side road - fun for all kids! What’s Inside Amazing Car Creator - Kids Vehicle Designer ★ 30 amazing cars for children to choose in this dressup/ driving game ★ 20 colorful doors that match different styles for children to pick ★ 20 awesome fenders and 10 different rears to dressup & make the cars your own! ★ 20 funky wheels & rims - crazy, wacky and fun, bicycle & more... ★ Accessorize your vehicle with neat stickers, race numbers and more! ★ Obstacles make this driving game an exciting challenge - look out as you drive! Amazing Car Creator - Kids Vehicle Designer Features: ★ Take your car for a Test Drive! ★ Start your engine and pretend to race - rev up with 4 different scenes ★ Watch out for the obstacles! ★ Drive on different courses ★ Build your car at home or in a professional garage - children decide! ★ Improved menu system- children can easily navigate through the app ★ Get crafty with children and show their masterpieces to friends! description: Everyone’s favorite - the classic story of Cinderella packed with dressup activities, coloring pages, puzzles, and many more exciting games! Packed with superb animation & fantastic interactive activities, this famous fairytale comes alive in an amazing production! Create your own Cinderella Dress Up Storybook and make the beautiful Cinderella your own! Use your imagination and dress up Cinderella in dozens of magnificent ways. With loads of accessories and matching clothes to choose from, pick Cinderella’s tiara, necklace, gloves and dress! Outfit the prince with a matching crown, cape, shoes and a full suit! Choose dresses for Cinderella’s step sisters and read the famous story like never before. Each of the characters are exactly how you designed! What’s Inside: ★ Help Cinderella dress up for the Ball with the help of her fairy godmother - interactive activity ★ Choose the perfect princess dress for the Ball - dressup activity ★ Join Cinderella at her dance with the prince in the royal ball ★ Get the prince ready for the ball - choose his crown and fancy clothes ★ Help the prince find the owner of the glass slipper - interactive activity NEW exciting and educational games on each Cinderella Dress Up Storybook page! ★ Jigsaw puzzles - Awesome puzzles enhance the story and promote critical thinking skills ★ Paint-a-Picture - Dozens of coloring pages and paints ★ Get crafty with your kids and show their masterpieces to friends! ★ Memory Match - Fire up your child’s memory skills with this smart activity! ★ Placement Puzzle - Place a character in their puzzle piece ★ Find the Item - Critical thinking skills and memory come together in this fun activity ★ Memorize and Place - A great memory game that relates to the story and sharpens retention Cinderella Dress Up and Storybook for Kids is a lively, engaging story that brings the classic fairytale into a modern, interactive experience. From the pumpkin to the glass slipper, kids can touch and interact with the famous fairytale bringing it to life like never before! Tap the pumpkin and turn it into Cinderella’s carriage. Choose Cinderella’s clothes for the ball and help the prince locate his princess by finding who fits into the glass slipper. This is the perfect story to read to your kids for bedtime or any time! It’s the fairy tale dressup kids and their parents will love! Features: ★ “Dressup” - find dress up pages as you read and play ★ Beautiful HD illustrations joined with a rich narrative on every page ★ “Read it Myself” - allows you to control the reading yourself ★ “Read to Me” - automatically reads each page of the storybook ★ Enjoy numerous engaging and fun animations on each page. description: > It’s time to take care of Vampires with brand new tools: tweezers, pliers, blood infusion and more! > Diagnose, treat, and cure your vampire patients! > Cure unique Vampire ailments like the “common thornitis” and “stake through the heart” disorder! Are you up to the test, Doctor Dracula? Your newest series of patients are lying in their coffins, but they’re not dead yet! They’re spooky vampires! Even vampires need to go to the hospital! Help four vampires get healthy by using all of your awesome doctor skills and tools! It’s up to you, Doctor Dracula! To diagnose these pale patients, you’re going to have to use some new tools and strategies! Use the different pairs of special tweezers to remove any thorns, and pliers for any silver bullets! You may even need a pair of big pliers to get rid of wooden stakes! When your vampire gets a little bloodthirsty, you’ll need to quench their thirst with an infusion! And careful you don’t shine the lamp on them too long-- they’ll get a burn! Vampires can be tricky to care for, but you can heal them! Once you know what’s making them sick, it’s time to take care of them! Give them an infusion, treat them with a vaccine, bandage their wounds! Just don’t get too close-- they’ve got sharp fangs! Features: > Diagnose the vampires with the help of awesome measuring tools like the thermometer, stethoscope, x-ray, tweezers, pliers, lamp, and infusion! > Treat the vampires’ injuries from wooden stakes and silver bullets with special sets of pliers and tweezers! You can even give them a blood transfusion! > Listen to the vampires’ needs from the coffin-- they may give you a hint on what to do! > Careful how you treat them-- what works for humans doesn’t always work with vampires and the lamp might just burn them! What’s Inside: > Four sickly vampires that need your care! > Diagnosing tools like the stethoscope, thermometer, x-ray, pliers, and lamp! > Treatment tools like the different tweezers to fix vampire wounds, and you can even give them an infusion to quench their thirst for blood! > A first aid kit and a pro kit filled with all the tools you’ll ever need! > 16 colorful bandages, plasters, and stitches! description: This application includes nearly 2000 carefully selected Islamic Quotes by eminent Islamic figures and the Holy Quran.

Pilot the PowerUp 3.0, first ever Smartphone Controlled Paper Airplane, using the PowerUp app. Fold It: Simply fold a piece of copier paper into a paper airplane. Attach It: Attach the PowerUp 3.0 Smart Module to your paper airplane. Connect It: Connect to your PowerUp Smart Module by Bluetooth and you are ready to fly. Bluetooth Smart technology will provide up to 180 feet of range. Fly It: Push throttle to full and launch the paper airplane high up into the sky. Tilt your smartphone to the left or to the right to steer your plane, increase or reduce throttle to go up or down. Easy intuitive flying: The PowerUp 3.0 Smart Module is programmed to compensate thrust when you turn right or left. So even beginners can enjoy sharp turns and stunts. Endless Airplane Designs: You can create endless designs from slow fliers and speedy jets that will fly with your PowerUp 3.0 Smart module, it is all up to your imagination. - The Top half of the screen displays an artificial cockpit-like horizon that responds to your hand movements. - The App displays the current battery level and signal strength level which represents the flight range. - The App will also show charging status and indicate when battery is full. *Note: This App requires the PowerUp 3.0 Smart module and will not work without it. More information is available at http://poweruptoys.com
release_text: New in v2.2.1: This minor update fixes some issues with rudder control. This update is highly recommended for all users who have v2.2. New in v2.2: This update is all about our new, highly improved FlightAssist™ algorithm! You now have a beginner-friendly mode, and an advanced mode (default) with more control. Expert pilots can also turn it off completely. Several bugs have also been fixed for better stability and compatibility of Bluetooth connection.

app_name: (曜日と時刻で自動切替)スマートマナー
description: 設定した曜日と時刻にマナーモードの自動切り替えを行うアプリです。 このアプリは常駐しない設計になっておりますのでタスクキラー系のアプリとの併用も可能です。 また、個人情報に関わるアクセス許可も無く、広告等もございませんので安心してご利用ください。 It is an application that performs automatic switching into silent mode of the day and time that you set. It can be used in combination with task killer app because systems are not designed to be resident in this app. Also, please use with confidence without permission related to personal information, such as advertising, so can not thank you.

It's 2014. When Mr. Jokowi meets Obama in a PingPong Game Play. This is a traditional Pong Game in modern way. We convert the game play with adding some artificial intelligence codes and transformed it to Android OS. Who is Jokowi? Jokowi is a Governor of DKI Jakarta - Indonesia. In 2014, Jokowi adds his name to the growing list of candidates vying for the highest office in Indonesia, alongside figures such as Prabowo Subianto, Wiranto and Aburizal Bakrie. Compared to those senior politicians, Jokowi lacks experience in the national political arena but he can make up for it with his sheer popularity. Besides, his track record in running the city of Surakarta, more popularly known as Solo, and now Jakarta, are impressive. But is he really ready to become the president of Indonesia? We Believe in Jokowi! Yes he can! Yes, He is ready to be our next president. We support his campaign by making this Android game and spread it to the world. Why Obama? Why not? Obama is our idol. He is too good to be true to be USA President. We love him and We think, Jokowi has similarty with Obama : A good man in right time! So? Let's play Jokowi versus Obama Game Now! Time is Running..... Theme Song by Helmy Jagostu. Arranged by MR. PRESIDENT BAND - Jogjakarta.
release_text: Jokowi versus Obama Game - Optimized and reduced Size, so you can install this game faster.

description: De route leidt u langs bijzondere hotspots, die u meer vertellen over de rijke leder- en schoenenindustrie in De Langstraat. Deze app geeft u verder tips voor onderweg voor leuke activiteiten, horecagelegenheden en overnachtingsplaatsen. The route leads you along particular hotspots, which tell you more about the rich leather and footwear industry in the Langstraat. This app gives you tips on the go for fun activities, catering establishments and beds.

『神と人、僕は二人の少女に恋をした』 ■概要 全十三話連作短編ノベル『収穫の十二月』シリーズ 第八話「神学の七月」 ノベルゲーム風の演出を使用した電子書籍です。 漫画調の挿絵とキャラクターの演出と共に、 文章によるストーリーをお楽しみいただけます。 ◆第一話の「収穫の十二月」は無料配信中です。 talestune Android専用サイト http://www.talestune.com/android/ □音声無し 主題歌、オープニングムービーを収録 □セーブ機能 どこまで読み進めたかを記録しておくことができます。 □オートセーブ機能 起動中のメール着信や強制終了時には、自動的に記録されます。 記録されたセーブデータはタイトル画面のつづきからのAuto Loadからロード出来ます。 ■操作方法 ・二本指タップでメニュー ・三本指タッチしたままでメッセージスキップ ・上下フリックで、テキストの読み返し機能 ・タップして1秒ホールドでオートモード ・左フリックでテキスト非表示 ・右フリックで読了したテキストをスキップ ■あらすじ 夏を迎えた多紙町に、異形の神たちが大量に出現した。 その原因は、異形の神を制御していた土地神であるしろの力が、突如として失われたためであった。 柾木たちはしろの力を取り戻す方法を探すと同時に、町に被害をもたらし始めた異形の神を退治する自警団を組織する。 神の力を失ったしろは、事態に責任を感じるが、何もできないことに落ちこんでゆく。 柾木は落ちこんでいるしろを自分の家に招き、しばらくの間一緒に暮らすことを提案する。 しろが立ち直りつつあったその時、しろに従っていたはずのシロウが異形の神たちを率いて反逆を始める。 ■作品に対するご意見、ご感想などはこちらへ talestuneホームページ http://www.talestune.com talestune Android専用サイト http://www.talestune.com/android/ Eメールアドレス talestune@gmail.com talestuneの最新情報をTwitterでチェック! Magic: The Gathering life counter and token manager. Keep track of your life and poison counters as well as your opponent's. Have a deck with tokens? You can keep track of your tokens on the battlefield as well! Add +1/+1 counters, destroy tokens, tap all tokens, it's all available at the click of a button! Never again be forced to carry around boxes of tokens for your decks! Need to flip a coin or roll a die? It's all right here!
release_text: 1.6 - Added tokens 1.5 - Added tokens for the next expansion, added ability to create a copy of the last token added 1.4 - Added link to Gatherer Database 1.3 - Fixed resolution problems for higher DPI devices, added option for changing token size 1.2 - Added delay for dice roll, more tokens, and changed token sort order 1.1 - Added dice, more token creatures, and action bar buttons

description: Get the "Maillot Jaune" (Yellow Jersey) ! Playing Cycling Pro 2011, you will be able to : -Race against 20 opponents, -Run town, countryside and mountain stages, -Manage your leader fatigue, -Ask teammates help at appropriate times. Features: - 12 singles stages, - "Tours" championships of 3, 7 or 12 stages, - Automatic backup to resume interrupted games, - 3 difficulty levels -Requires CPU >700MHz -Also optimized for HD tablet display. We recommended you to try free version "Cycling 2011" before purchase this one.

Get the Yellow Jersey ! In this free version, you play the leader of your team in the last stage of the Tour. You are second overall at 7 seconds of the yellow jersey "Maillot Jaune". Can you win the Tour ? Playing Cycling 2011, you will be able to : -Race against 20 opponents, -Manage your leader fatigue, -Ask teammates help at appropriate times. -Requires CPU >700MHz -Also optimized for HD tablet display. ================== Cycling Pro 2011 "full version" provides: - 12 singles stages, - "Tours" championships of 3, 7 or 12 stages, -Town, countryside and mountain stages, - Automatic backup to resume interrupted games, - 3 difficulty levels =================

Get into shape before the Tour de France ! Race to conquer the Yellow Jersey ! In the world of Cycling 2013, you'll be cycling on the road and on the velodrome banked track. While you take on stages through urban areas or in the mountains, you'll need to manage your cyclist's fatigue level and contend with the aggressive moves of your competitors. Are you up to the challenge? Now, the sport, it's on your tablet! ____________________________________ 3 GAME MODES Cycling 2013 lets you progress in the single stage mode on any of 15 different courses, but you can also set out to capture the yellow jersey through 10 Grands Tours with 3, 5 or 7 stages. And to really get your adrenaline pumping, you can go up against the computer on a bike track with 10 additional challenges. REALISTIC GRAPHICS Cycling 2013 immerses you in an authentic atmosphere. You'll progress through detailed and realistic environments accompanied by cinematic effects to celebrate your victories. GAMEPLAY Cycling 2013 offers an intuitive game play system that is easy to get the hang of, so it's perfect for both amateurs and the most experienced gamers. LEADERBOARD Challenge the computer or your friends with on-line leaderboard and pulverize the world's records! In every challenge, you can become the uncontested master of the world rankings. FEATURES 15 urban, countryside, and mountain stages 10 Grands Tours with 3, 5 or 7 stages 10 challenges in the cycling velodrome arena 5 difficulty levels 6 athletes with differing performance levels

A 3D platform game through 21 levels. Play as Captain d'Artagnan and fight the corrupted Musketeers in this game filled with action and riddles. Story: On 5th September 1661, the King Of France Louis XIV ordered Captain d'Artagnan of the company of Musketeers to arrest Nicolas Fouquet in the Castle of Nantes. Armed with your sword, you must kill all the corrupted musketeers, get into the royal tower and imprison the "Surintendant de Finances" Nicolas Fouquet. In this game, you will progress through 21 levels trying to push your limits. Run, swim, jump to solve various riddles that will give you access to the royal tower of the last level. This free version allows to play the 3 levels. The full version "Musketeers Pro" provides the 21 levels without advertising.
